news_header: Israeli forces will remain in five strategic locations in southern Lebanon after the withdrawal deadline, as Lebanon's government opposes any further delay. An Israeli strike killed a senior Hamas leader, coinciding with the 500th day since Hamas's attack that ignited the Gaza war.
news_original_title: Israeli forces will remain in 5 locations in Lebanon after Tuesday&#8217;s pullout deadline, official says
news_text: Amidst ongoing tensions, Israel is expanding settlements in the West Bank, which Palestinians view as an obstacle to peace. Protests in Israel call for an extension of the ceasefire to facilitate the release of hostages held by Hamas. The situation remains complex with conflicting goals between Israel and Hamas regarding hostages and military actions.
